name: Box Cutter
desc2: Equip to increase Stun Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: An energy W-Engine modded from spare parts of a truck's engine. It converts the original cylinder into an energy storage unit, which is highly advantageous.

phase.name: Watch Your Fingers
phase.desc: Upon launching an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color>, the equipper's <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color>, and Daze increases by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>, lasting 10s.
